q_ch: Advanced裁剪组还未完成的裁剪任务是哪些顾客的订单？
q_en: Which customer orders are the cutting tasks that the Advanced Cutting Group has not yet completed?

command: SELECT id FROM working_group WHERE name = 'Advanced Cutters';
SELECT order_product_id FROM cutting_tasks WHERE working_group_id = 'wg6' AND completed_number < planned_number;
SELECT order_id FROM order_product WHERE id IN ('op15', 'op32');

SELECT o.id AS order_id, o.order_name, c.customer_name
 FROM orders o
 JOIN customers c ON o.user_id = c.id
 WHERE o.id IN ('o4', 'o10');
